title: Green Vegetarian Cuisine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Kosher
description: Part of the Green Vegetarian restaurants from San Antonio, this location opened Jan 2014. Features southern American comfort food with daily specials, plus desserts, fresh fruit smoothies, organic teas and coffee. Has gluten free menu and box lunch service. Casual with counter service. Family owned and operated.
